traits.name: False Appearance
entries: While the clockwork dragon remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a metal statue.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d10 + 2 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Fire Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The clockwork dragon exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw, taking 14 (4d6 damage) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
